pbi:mashup.document:
section Section1;
shared #"Service Category" = let
  Source = Transportation2_load,
  #"Promoted headers" = Table.PromoteHeaders(Source, [PromoteAllScalars = true]),
  #"Removed other columns" = Table.SelectColumns(#"Promoted headers", {"Service_category"}),
  #"Removed duplicates" = Table.Distinct(#"Removed other columns", {"Service_category"}),
  #"Added index" = Table.AddIndexColumn(#"Removed duplicates", "Category_Id", 1, 1, Int64.Type),
  #"Reordered columns" = Table.ReorderColumns(#"Added index", {"Category_Id", "Service_category"})
in
  #"Reordered columns";
shared Location = let
  Source = Transportation2_load,
  PromoteHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Source, [PromoteAllScalars = true]),
  RemoveOtherColumns = Table.SelectColumns(PromoteHeaders, {"Origin_location", "Destination_location"}),
  ConvertToList_Destination = RemoveOtherColumns[Destination_location],
  ConvertToList_Origin = RemoveOtherColumns[Origin_location],
  OriginAndDestinationList= List.Combine({{ConvertToList_Origin}, {ConvertToList_Destination}}),
  ConvertToTable = Table.FromList(OriginAndDestinationList, Splitter.SplitByNothing(), null, null, ExtraValues.Error),
  ExpandColumn1 = Table.ExpandListColumn(ConvertToTable, "Column1"),
  RenameColumnLocation = Table.RenameColumns(ExpandColumn1, {{"Column1", "Location"}}),
  ChangeColumnType2 = Table.TransformColumnTypes(RenameColumnLocation, {{"Location", type text}}),
  RemoveDuplicates = Table.Distinct(ChangeColumnType2, {"Location"}),
  AddLocationID = Table.AddIndexColumn(RemoveDuplicates, "Location_Id", 1, 1, Int64.Type),
  ReorderColumns = Table.ReorderColumns(AddLocationID, {"Location_Id", "Location"})
in
  ReorderColumns;
shared #"Trailer Status" = let
  Source = Transportation2_load,
  #"Promoted headers" = Table.PromoteHeaders(Source, [PromoteAllScalars = true]),
  #"Removed other columns" = Table.SelectColumns(#"Promoted headers", {"Trailer_status"}),
  #"Removed duplicates" = Table.Distinct(#"Removed other columns", {"Trailer_status"}),
  #"Added index" = Table.AddIndexColumn(#"Removed duplicates", "TrailerStatus_Id", 1, 1, Int64.Type),
  #"Reordered columns" = Table.ReorderColumns(#"Added index", {"TrailerStatus_Id", "Trailer_status"})
in
  #"Reordered columns";
shared #"Road Status" = let
  Source = Transportation2_load,
  #"Promoted headers" = Table.PromoteHeaders(Source, [PromoteAllScalars = true]),
  #"Removed other columns" = Table.SelectColumns(#"Promoted headers", {"Road_status"}),
  #"Removed duplicates" = Table.Distinct(#"Removed other columns", {"Road_status"}),
  #"Added index" = Table.AddIndexColumn(#"Removed duplicates", "RoadStatus_Id", 1, 1, Int64.Type),
  #"Reordered columns" = Table.ReorderColumns(#"Added index", {"RoadStatus_Id", "Road_status"})
in
  #"Reordered columns";
shared #"Trip Status" = let
  Source = Transportation2_load,
  #"Promoted headers" = Table.PromoteHeaders(Source, [PromoteAllScalars = true]),
  #"Removed other columns" = Table.SelectColumns(#"Promoted headers", {"Trip_status"}),
  #"Removed duplicates" = Table.Distinct(#"Removed other columns", {"Trip_status"}),
  #"Added index" = Table.AddIndexColumn(#"Removed duplicates", "TripStatus_Id", 1, 1, Int64.Type),
  #"Reordered columns" = Table.ReorderColumns(#"Added index", {"TripStatus_Id", "Trip_status"})
in
  #"Reordered columns";
shared #"Invoice Status" = let
  Source = Transportation2_load,
  #"Promoted headers" = Table.PromoteHeaders(Source, [PromoteAllScalars = true]),
  #"Removed other columns" = Table.SelectColumns(#"Promoted headers", {"Invoice_status"}),
  #"Removed duplicates" = Table.Distinct(#"Removed other columns", {"Invoice_status"}),
  #"Added index" = Table.AddIndexColumn(#"Removed duplicates", "InvoiceStatus_Id", 1, 1, Int64.Type),
  #"Reordered columns" = Table.ReorderColumns(#"Added index", {"InvoiceStatus_Id", "Invoice_status"})
in
  #"Reordered columns";
shared FilePath = "https://altasymposium-my.sharepoint.com/personal/fernando_calero_altasymposium_onmicrosoft_com/Documents/BI/Samples/Freight and Transport/" meta [IsParameterQuery = true, IsParameterQueryRequired = true, Type = type text];
shared FileNameTrip = "trips_df.csv" meta [IsParameterQuery = true, IsParameterQueryRequired = true, Type = type text];
shared Transportation2_load = let
  Source = Csv.Document(Web.Contents(FilePath & FileNameTrip), [Delimiter = ",", Columns = 17, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.None])
in
  Source;
shared FileNameDrivers = "drivers_df.csv" meta [IsParameterQuery = true, IsParameterQueryRequired = true, Type = type text];
shared FileNameCustomers = "customers_df.csv" meta [IsParameterQuery = true, IsParameterQueryRequired = true, Type = type text];
shared Drivers_load = let
  Source = Csv.Document(Web.Contents(FilePath & FileNameDrivers), [Delimiter = ",", Columns = 5, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.None])
in
  Source;
shared Drivers = let
  Source = Drivers_load,
  #"Promoted headers" = Table.PromoteHeaders(Source, [PromoteAllScalars = true]),
  #"Changed column type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Promoted headers", {{"Driver_id", Int64.Type}, {"Driver_name", type text}, {"Marital_status", type text}, {"Age", Int64.Type}, {"Education", type text}}),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(#"Changed column type", {{"Driver_id", "Driver Id"}, {"Driver_name", "Driver Name"}, {"Marital_status", "Marital Status"}})
in
  #"Renamed columns";
shared Customers_load = let
  Source = Csv.Document(Web.Contents(FilePath & FileNameCustomers), [Delimiter = ",", Columns = 2, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.None])
in
  Source;
shared Customers = let
  Source = Customers_load,
  #"Promoted headers" = Table.PromoteHeaders(Source, [PromoteAllScalars = true]),
  #"Changed column type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Promoted headers", {{"Customer_id", Int64.Type}, {"Customer_name", type text}})
in
  #"Changed column type";
shared Trailers_load = let
  Source = Csv.Document(Web.Contents(FilePath & FileNameTrailers), [Delimiter = ",", Columns = 6, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.None])
in
  Source;
shared FileNameTrailers = "trailers_df.csv" meta [IsParameterQuery = true, IsParameterQueryRequired = true, Type = type text];
shared Trailers = let
  Source = Trailers_load,
  #"Promoted headers" = Table.PromoteHeaders(Source, [PromoteAllScalars = true]),
  #"Changed column type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Promoted headers", {{"Trailer_id", Int64.Type}, {"Trailer_code", type text}, {"Trailer_year_model", Int64.Type}, {"Make", type text}, {"Horsepower", Int64.Type}, {"Axle_configuration", type text}}),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(#"Changed column type", {{"Trailer_id", "Trailer Id"}, {"Trailer_code", "Trailer Code"}, {"Trailer_year_model", "Year Model"}, {"Axle_configuration", "Axle Configuration"}})
in
  #"Renamed columns";
